official.headline: Systems Paused
official.anchor_line: Certain digital governance systems have been temporarily suspended while specialized review teams conduct enhancements.
official.contextual_reframing: City infrastructure continues to operate reliably. Ongoing improvements ensure lasting public benefit and resilience.

official.headline: Public Forum Rises
official.anchor_line: Citizen assemblies are contributing their voices at moderated neighborhood forums across Stenograd.
official.contextual_reframing: Community participation is encouraged to strengthen harmony as new channels for open dialogue emerge citywide.

official.headline: Era of Deliberation
official.anchor_line: Civic assemblies now steer city decisions, marking a new phase of collaborative self-governance.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd's flexibility and unity guide a smooth transition as all factions seek consensus for continued progress.

underground.headline: Blackout at the Core
underground.anchor_line: The BCI is down. Nobody's in charge and the screens lie empty.
underground.contextual_reframing: Power is scattered and so are the facts. The truth behind Halden’s sudden end and lost override codes leaks onto the street — no one trusts what’s next.

underground.headline: Council in the Shadows
underground.anchor_line: While you debate in the streets, old Council hands whisper deals and evade blame.
underground.contextual_reframing: Assemblies demand real answers. Don’t let quiet voices in sealed rooms decide how you live. Show up, speak up — they can’t hide behind metrics anymore.

underground.headline: City in Our Hands
underground.anchor_line: Assemblies flood every district. Ordinary people are running Stenograd for the first time in years.
underground.contextual_reframing: It’s messy, loud, and real — but it’s ours. With no one left to score us, we write the next chapter. Council or not, this city is awake.
